nhc_headline: ...BERYL STRENGTHENING... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BEFORE IT REACHES THE WINDWARD  ISLANDS...
summary:
...BERYL STRENGTHENING... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BEFORE IT REACHES THE WINDWARD  ISLANDS...
 As of 8:00 AM AST Sat Jun 29
 the center of Beryl was located near 9.8, -46.8
 with movement W at 21 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
